product.title: Home on the Range | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Home on the Range

Based on the 2004 animated Disney movie, this Old West adventure recounts the journey of three mismatched dairy cows as they attempt to save their farm, The Little Piece of Heaven, from foreclosure. To raise the money Farmer Pearl needs to save the farm, the bovine heroes devise a plan to capture cattle rustler Alameda Slim, and present the bounty to the sheriff on Farmer Pearl’s behalf. Though the brave heroines encounter villains along the way, they are not discouraged, and never lose sight of their loyalty to their cause.

Tie-in Activity: Take your child on a "field trip" to a local dairy farm. Most farms offer tours of barns and crop fields, and some even allow children to try their hand at milking cows.
